game.name: Crazy Balls
game.description: Ya-hooo! There is just a thing you must remember to play this game: little chicks do not like being crushed by the balls! Help the chick to reach all the diamonds and the coins to increase your score but don't forget to avoid the crazy balls, because they are out of control!
game.metaTitle: Crazy Balls, Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Crazy Balls at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Crazy Balls Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: TAP TO FLY TO PICK THE DIAMOND AND AVOID THE BALLS
game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO FLY, AVOID HITTING WITH THE BALL
